column4: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being totally dementedly crazy and 10 being absolutely 100% safe, how sensible would it be to upgrade to precise now, on my main, personal / work laptop?
considering the new auto-upgrade option shipped on ubuntu cds, perfectly fine
I'm in the same boat, thinking I might skip 11.10 and go straight to precise...
but you only want to upgrade to 11.10, right? otherwise, you might as well pour water in your CPU
